00031 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_StoreUploadedFiles extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00032         
00041         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00042                 $this->gp = $gp;
00043                 $this->settings = $settings;
00044                 
00045                 //read redirect page
00046                 $email_redirect = $settings['redirect_page'];
00047                 if($this->settings['finishedUploadFolder']) {
00048                         
00049                         //move the uploaded files
00050                         $this->moveUploadedFiles();
00051                 }
00052                 
00053                 return $this->gp;
00054         }
00055         
00077         protected function moveUploadedFiles() {
00078                 session_start();
00079                 $filesToCopy = array();
00080                 if(isset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']) && is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'])) {
00081                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'] as $field=>$files) {
00082                                 foreach($files as $file) {
00083                                         $fullFilename['path'] = $file['uploaded_path'];
00084                                         $fullFilename['name'] = $file['uploaded_name'];
00085                                         array_push($filesToCopy,$fullFilename);
00086                                 }
00087                         }
00088                         
00089                         if(count($filesToCopy) > 0) {
00090                                 $newFolder = $this->settings['finishedUploadFolder'];
00091                                 if(strlen($newFolder) > 0 ) {
00092                                         $newFolder = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($newFolder);
00093                                         $uploadPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$newFolder;
00094                                         foreach($filesToCopy as $file) {
00095                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Copying file '".$file['path'].$file['name']."' to '".$uploadPath.$file['name']."'!",false);
00096                                                 copy($file['path'].$file['name'],$uploadPath.$file['name']);
00097                                                 unlink($file['path'].$file['name']);
00098                                         }
00099                                 }
00100                         }
00101                 }
00102         }
00103         
00104 }
00105 ?>
